arts.ttl: Newcastle Keen on 'One of the Biggest Talents' in Europe After Scouting Mission
arts.sum: Newcastle United could be set to add a top young starlet to their ranks after undergoing scouting missions

arts.ttl: What Newcastle away end did at full-time as 'dogs' send message to Liverpool
arts.sum: However, it was Bruno who was leading the away end's rendition of 'Tell me ma, me ma!' at full-time after firing the Magpies to a hard-fought win against West Ham at the London Stadium. Newcastle found themselves in ninth place before a ball had even been kicked; by the time the final whistle went, the black-and-whites had moved level on points with champions Manchester City.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher fires strong Newcastle United warning ahead of Carabao Cup Final
arts.sum: The former Reds defender was on punditry duty on Sky Sports Monday Night Football ahead of the Magpies' clash with West Ham United alongside former Southampton boss Russell Martin. While Carragher questioned if the Magpies' had one eye on the Carabao cup Final, Martin questioned the lack of intensity in recent weeks from Eddie Howe's side but did acknowledge the injuries and suspensions the Toon have had in recent weeks.

arts.ttl: Who is Lennon Miller? The Scottish star being linked with Newcastle, Sunderland and Liverpool
arts.sum: Motherwell rejected a bid of around £2.5m from Italian side Udinese in January, while French club Lyon have also expressed an interest in Miller. Lee previously told the Warm Up podcast that Lennon needed to be playing and highlighted the importance of his son's next move as he continues to develop.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United's January transfer wildcard impresses Eddie Howe with blistering message
arts.sum: Steve Harper and Paul Midgley [head of youth recruitment] showed me the pathway of players such as Alex Murphy, who came through Galway's academy and then signed for Newcastle like myself." The 18-year-old arrived in January from Galway United with the club's Academy excited to beat Wolverhampton Wanderers to his signature.

arts.ttl: Howe praises the 'heart and desire' of Newcastle's players
arts.sum: Bruno Guimaraes struck the only goal of the game at the London Stadium as Howe's side picked up three points to stay firmly in the race for a UEFA Champions League spot. Howe was also delighted at his team's focus with Newcastle due to face Liverpool in the EFL Cup final at Wembley on Sunday.

arts.ttl: West Ham duo explain why Newcastle winner should have been disallowed
arts.sum: Graham Potter and Max Kilman both feel officials wrong not to rule out Bruno Guimaraes’ decisive second-half volley

arts.ttl: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe hails ‘massive win’ at West Ham ahead of cup final
arts.sum: Bruno Guimaraes stuck out a leg to turn home Harvey Barnes’ cross in the 63rd minute for the game’s only goal.

arts.ttl: Serie A ace linked with a surprise move to West Ham as Potter eyes big defensive upgrade
arts.sum: West Ham United are preparing for a significant squad overhaul this summer as manager Graham Potter looks to rebuild following a challenging Premier League campaign. Currently sitting 15th in the table, the Hammers have struggled this season, particularly under former manager Julen Lopetegui, who was sacked mid-season.
